locations.name: Main Left
locations.description: Main Left is at the top of section 102 on the third floor concourse. 12 ST Fiber (6 on the wall, 6 in the loose white box).

locations.name: Main Right
locations.description: Main Right is at the top of section 103 on the third floor concourse. 12 ST Fiber all to the loose white box.

locations.name: Main Reverse
locations.description: Main Reverse is at the top of section 111 on the third floor concourse. 6 ST Fiber

locations.name: South Endzone/Sec 116
locations.description: South Endzone is at the top of Section 116. 6 ST Fiber labeled as Section 116, 12 ST labeled South Endzone.

locations.name: North Endzone/Sec 107
locations.description: North Endzone is at the top of Section 107. 12 ST Fiber.

locations.name: Section 118
locations.description: Section 118 is at the top of Section 118. 12 ST that run to 4440 (Location 8) as SC APC.

locations.name: Near Right High Slash/Sec 211
locations.description: Near Right High Slash is at the top of section 211 on the 4th Floor Concourse. 12 ST Fiber pulled here. 6 ST Fiber labeled Near Right High Slash (FULL) and 6 Labeled New Near Right High Slash.

locations.name: 4440 (4th floor Storage)
locations.description: 4440 is located behind section 201. A single door to the right of double doors. The fiber in the room is located at the top of the left DAK Rack. 6 ST and 24 SC APC to Truck Dock.

locations.name: Catwalk
locations.description: CenterHung is located on the cat walk in the center. Access this by the middle doors on the 4th floor north or south of venue.

locations.name: Truck Dock
locations.description: The truck dock is located off of Floor Far Left. All of the Venue IO run through this box.

locations.name: Floor Far Left
locations.description: FFL is in the southwest corner of the arena between section K and L.

locations.name: Floor Far Right
locations.description: FFR is located in the North West corner of the arena between section F and G.

locations.name: Floor Near Right
locations.description: FNR is located in the North East corner of the arena between section C and D.

locations.name: Floor Near Left
locations.description: FNL is located in the South East corner of the arena between secton A and N.

locations.name: Floor Pocket 1
locations.description: Floor Pocket 1 is located on the near side of the court in front of section B and C.

locations.name: Floor Pocket 2
locations.description: Floor Pocket 2 is located on the far side of the court in front of section H.

locations.name: Auburn Men's Locker Room
locations.description: The Fiber in the Men's locker room is located under the cabinets inside of their locker room behind section M.

locations.name: Media Room
locations.description: Media room is located to the right of the elevator off Floor Far Left area.

locations.name: Auburn Women's Locker Room
locations.description: Women's locker room has 2 SDI cables ran to the back of their film review room.

locations.name: Truck Dock
locations.description: The truck dock is located off of Floor Far Left. All of the Venue IO run through this box.

locations.name: Press Level 1
locations.description: Left silver box on photo deck. Located near south 45 yd line.

locations.name: Press Level 2
locations.description: Right silver box on photo deck. Located near south 45 yd line.

locations.name: North Endzone
locations.description: Silver box on the NorthWest corner on a brick wall at field level. Power is located on the west sideline fence.

locations.name: South Endzone
locations.description: Silver box near the cheer stand on the SouthEast corner on a brick pillar at field level. Power is located on the east sideline fence.

locations.name: Tunnel
locations.description: Silver box under the bleachers on the west side wall of the south tunnel.

locations.name: High Right Endzone
locations.description: Silver box at the top of the south endzone under the videoboard clock.
Between section 12 and 13. 1415 is the main fiber hub for all connections that do not originate in the truck pedistal.

locations.name: Low Third
locations.description: 6 ST in the right box. 12 ST in the left box (primarily saved for hawkeye)

maps.label: Aquatics Center
maps.subtitle: From closet by trophy case poolside

locations.name: Left Concourse (2nd Floor)
locations.description: Facing the pool on the 2nd floor concourse, the left camera well is on the far left.

maps.label: Auburn Soccer Complex
maps.subtitle: From center of trailer top of bleachers

locations.name: Tower
locations.description: On top of the booth. Accessed by a ladder on the backside. 12 ST fiber

locations.name: Video Board
locations.description: Directly under the videoboard. 24 ST fiber. The last 6 are hard patched to bench fiber (5).

locations.name: Booth
locations.description: Booth where all the magic happens.

locations.name: LaDove Lounge
locations.description: Single Coax converted to SDI from booth (1). This converts to HDMI into extron machine for the TVs in LaDove.
